game_description: The islands of your Empire have been invaded, and only you and your war balloon can save them!! Fly your war balloon through an array of different missions and enemies. Use cannons, missiles and bombs to blast and pop your way to victory! Features: * Simple, fun, addictive gameplay - just point and shoot! * 40 varied and challenging levels. * A wide range of enemy/target types, including 10 aerial adversaries. * Play seated, standing, or however you like. * Tiny file size! BEFORE YOU PLAY: * Note that you steer using the Oculus controller (the right by default), not by turning your head. * If you're left-handed, you can switch to the left controller in Options.
review_1: I was a balloon gunner for many years until a devastating hydrogen-related incident caused my brain to fall out of my left ear! I was able to replace it but my newfound fear of hydrogen spelled the end of that career. I'm now able to relive those days thanks to Balloon Gunner. Thankfully this game makes great use of virtual-helium. Technology has finally found a reason to exist!
review_2: This game is really fun but sit to prevent motion sickness!
